fields.name: Dracula's Chateau
fields.description: A Halloween special! You were asking around the Main Hall for an adventure, and suddenly you're face-to-face with Dracula's minions! Bring your magic sword and a few stakes, or you'll be food for the vampires.
fields.intro_text:
One day being bored and wanting to go on an adventure, you went to the Eamon Adventure Service and asked if they could arrange for you to go on an adventure. The receptionist told you to go into the back room to see the man in charge.

The man told you that most of the adventures were being used now, but there was one special adventure that you might like to go on since you look like the adventurous type. He then gave these explicit instructions...

1. Go up to the bar and order a drink.
1. When you finish keep ordering more.
1. Keep this up as long as you can and we'll take it from there.

---

These seemed like rather simple but strange instructions. You decided to follow them anyway. After a while, besides being drunk, you found mother nature knocking at your door. You felt the need to find a rest room very quickly so you sought one out. Within a reasonable amount of time you located one, only to find that after stepping in you were in a room made of rock. Before you realized it, the door which you had just stepped through was now solid stone.

You suddenly realized that this was your adventure and that you were sober and completely relieved of your earlier conflict with mother nature.

A voice echoed to you saying, "I hope you enjoy your adventure!" And then there was silence...

fields.name: You are in a belfry.  (D)
fields.description: You are in the bell tower of the castle.  To the north, east, and west is thick forest except for a path directly west.  To the south is ocean and to the southwest is a small island in the ocean.

fields.name: You are in the mummy's tomb- north.  (S)
fields.description: You are in the northern section of the mummy's tomb.  You smell a strange odor in the air.  Bandages and the like litter the floor around you.  The only exit is to the south.

fields.name: You are in the mummy's tomb- west.  (E)
fields.description: This room is in much need of a good coat of paint.  It appears to be a work room of sorts.  Wood chips and chunks of wood are scattered about.  The only exit is to the east.

fields.name: You are in the mummy's tomb- by stairwell.  (N/S/E/W/U/D)
fields.description: You are in what appears to be the domain of a mummy.  Scraps of rotten bandages litter the floor.  There are doors in every direction including up and down the stairs.

fields.name: You are in the mummy's tomb- east.  (W)
fields.description: As you look around, you notice the very Egyptian style of this room.  The walls are flagrantly endowed with riches of a past society, all out of reach.  Hieroglyphics are present elsewhere.  The only exit is to the west.

fields.name: You are in the mummy's tomb- south.  (N)
fields.description: You are in a room with ubiquitous hieroglyphics.  Other than this, the room is spotlessly immaculate.  The only exit is north.

fields.name: You are in a north storage room.  (S)
fields.description: You are in a storage room with crates strewn about.  The only exit is south.

fields.name: You are in a west store room.  (E)
fields.description: You are in a dusty storage room.  It contains only garbage which is worthless to you, I hope.  The only exit is east.

fields.name: You are by a stairwell in a storage area.  (N/S/E/W/U/D)
fields.description: You are on the third floor by a stairwell.  It appears that this is a storage area from the dust and scraps of wood that litter the floor.  Exits are in all directions including up and down the stairs.

fields.name: You are in a wolves' lair.  (W)
fields.description: You are in the eastern storage room.  It appears to have become decrepit over the years.  The room is torn up in places and there are signs (such as the awful smell!) that a pack of wolves now live here.

fields.name: You are in a south storage room.  (N)
fields.description: You are in what appears to be a room used for storage of furs and the like, all of which have decayed into worthless scraps.  The only exit is north.

fields.name: You are in a witch's workroom.  (E)
fields.description: You are in a workroom of sorts.  There are tables lining the room some of which have vials of chemicals, flasks, cages of small animals, and the like.  On a perch near one corner sits a blackbird.  The only exit is east.

fields.name: You are in Bad Luck Tunnel.  (S/E/W)
fields.description: You find yourself in a tunnel with a strange cold feeling.  It is as if evil lurked here itself.  There are rooms to the east and west.  To the south is a polished brass door.  It opens readily from this side.

fields.name: You are in a witch's quarters.  (W)
fields.description: You have entered a bedroom.  On the wall is a diploma from the Transylvania School of Witchcraft.  The bed is lavishly decorated with silks that have various celestial objects on them.  The only exit is west.

fields.name: You are in a werewolf's quarters.  (S)
fields.description: You find yourself in what appears to be a wolf's den, or werewolf's den.  The walls are composed of dirt and grasses.  A snug little hole!?!  The only exit is the way you came in, south.

fields.name: You are in a rest room.  (E)
fields.description: You are in a somewhat clean rest room.  Possibly this is what you were looking for in the first place?  Other than a sink and a toilet the room is bare.  The only exit is east.

fields.name: You are in a north/south hallway.  (N/S/W)
fields.description: To the west is a room.  To the south is a staircase and the floor has been freshly polished.

fields.name: You are in a guest room.  (S)
fields.description: There is a bed and a very stylish fireplace.  Drapes cover any windows and lamps illuminate the room from above.  All of these are unaccessible because of placement or weight.  The only exit is south.

fields.name: You are in the bone room.  (S)
fields.description: You are in a room covered with bones and dead animal bodies.  They look like the remains of many meals.  Amongst the animal bones you notice the presence of some human bones.  The only exit is south.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection.  (N/S/E)
fields.description: You are at the end of an east/west corridor.  Rooms are to the north and south and the corridor continues to the east.

fields.name: You are in an east/west corridor.
fields.description: You are in an east/west corridor.  To the east you see a staircase and to the west the corridor continues.  The walls are made of smooth rock which is unfamiliar to you.  Lanterns hang from the ceiling giving the only light.

fields.name: You are by a stairwell on the 2nd floor.  (N/S/E/W/U/D)
fields.description: You are by a stairwell on the second floor of the chateau.  Passages go off in all directions including up and down the stairs.

fields.name: You are in an east/west corridor.  (N/E/W)
fields.description: There is a door to the north.  There is a staircase to the west and the corridor continues east.

fields.name: You are at the end of an east/west corridor.  (N/S/W)
fields.description: There are doors to the north and south.  The wallpaper here is peeling and plaster from the ceiling is mostly now on the floor.  There is little light here.

fields.name: You are in a damp and mossy cave.  (N)
fields.description: Water is dripping from the ceiling and moss and ferns cover the walls.  It appears that this was once a greenhouse but has since been abandoned.  The only exit is north.

fields.name: You are in the coffin room.  (E)
fields.description: You are in a side room that is filled with caskets.  The floor is dusty but there are no footprints.  The only exit is east.

fields.name: You are at entrance to Dracula's den.  (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You have entered a room that is styled in Classical Transylvania.  Scribbling on the wall warns for only the bravest or foolhardy to proceed.  Exits are north, south, east, and west.

fields.name: You are in Dracula's den.  (W)
fields.description: You have entered Dracula's den!  Two of the walls are lined with bookshelves filled with books on magic and evil.  There is a richly looking carpet on the floor but, it is nailed  down.  The only exit is west.

fields.name: You are in a refrigerator.  (N)
fields.description: You are in a very chilly room.  Meathooks hang from the ceiling but, there is a total lack of food.  The only exit is north.

fields.name: You are in Dracula's bedroom.  (E)
fields.description: You have entered Dracula's bedroom.  The walls are expensively decorated.  In one corner there is a solid gold statue of Dracula himself but, it is too heavy to lift.  In one corner is an Elizabethan style bed.  The only exit is east.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection.  (N/E/W)
fields.description: You are at the end of the hall in Dracula's domain.  There are doors to the east and the west.  The hall is to the north.

fields.name: You are in the slime room.  (W)
fields.description: You are in a room covered with slime and otherwise disgusting matter.  There is a very foul odor in this room.  It has nothing in it of value to you.

fields.name: You are in the brick room.  (E)
fields.description: You are in a room that appears to have been left incomplete when the rest of the castle was built.  The walls are of bare brick and the floor is hard packed earth.

fields.name: You are at a sharp bend.  (S/W)
fields.description: You are at a sharp bend with exits south and west.

fields.name: You are at the entrance to the north wing.  (N/S)
fields.description: You are in what appears to be the entrance to the north wing of the castle.  This wing looks rather small because of incompleteness or part of it being blocked off by someone.  South is a staircase and north is a hall.

fields.name: You are in a closet.  (S)
fields.description: You are in a small closet north of the main hallway.  The only exit is south.

fields.name: You are in the worship area.  (E)
fields.description: You are in a worshipping area.  Incense is strong in the air, and various religious paraphernalia is methodically placed around the immediate area.  Most of it, though, is worthless to you.  The only exit is to the east.

fields.name: You are at the entrance to a worship area.  (S/W)
fields.description: You can tell that you are at an entrance to some sort of prayer area by the incense mellifluously wisping past you.  Going west leads deeper into the temple.  To the south is the main hallway.

fields.name: You are in the entrance chamber.  (E/W)
fields.description: You are in the entrance chamber of the castle.  There is expensive looking furniture but it is all nailed down.  Possibly Dracula was expecting you, you devil!  There is an open door to the west and the main hallway to the east.

fields.name: You are at a stairwell on the main floor.  (N/S/E/W/U/D)
fields.description: You are on the main floor.  A staircase goes up and down.  To the north and south are the north and south wings (I'll let you figure which is which).  To the east the main hallway continues.  The hallway appears to continue west.

fields.name: You are at the entrance to the east wing.  (N/E/W)
fields.description: You are in the main hall.  It goes east and west and heads into the east wing.  A small door resides on the north wall.

fields.name: You are in the main hallway.  (S/E/W)
fields.description: There is a doorway to the south and the corridor continues both east and west.

fields.name: You are in the main hallway.  (E/W)
fields.description: The corridor continues both east and west.  There is an incense type of smell coming from the east.

fields.name: You are at a four-way intersection.  (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: There is a small corridor to the south and a larger one to the north.  There is incense coming from the north.  The corridor continues east and west.

fields.name: You are at a bend.  (S/W)
fields.description: You are at the end of the main hallway.  A rope ladder goes up to the top of the tower to the south.  Incense is coming from the west.  The east wall seems to have been carved unusually...

fields.name: You are at the entrance to the south wing.  (N/S/E)
fields.description: There is a staircase to the north and the corridor continues south.  There is a door to the east.

fields.name: You are in Dracula's wife's bedroom.  (W)
fields.description: You are in a richly decorated bedroom.  It appears to be owned by the wife of Dracula.  The whole room is decorated in a soft, light, greenish color.  The only exit is west.

fields.name: You are in the firewood room.  (N)
fields.description: You are in a room filled with firewood.  It appears to have been undisturbed for many decades.  The only exit is back north.

fields.name: You are at a dead end.  (N)
fields.description: To the north is a four-way intersection.  North is the only exit.  The south wall seems to have been carved unusually.

fields.name: You are at the end of south wing.  (N)
fields.description: You are at the unremarkable end of the south wing.  The only exit is back north.

fields.name: You are on a road.  (E/W)
fields.description: You are at the end of a dirt road.  East the road continues and west is the path back to the Main Hall.  There is impassable forest to the north and south.

fields.name: You are on an east/west dirt road.
fields.description: You are on a dirt road.  The road goes both east and west.  There is impassable forest to the north and south.

fields.name: You are at fork in road.  (S/E/W)
fields.description: You are on a dirt  road.  The main road goes east and west and there is a less travelled path leading south.  There is impassable forest to the north.

fields.name: You are on the west bank of a stream.  (E/W)
fields.description: You are on the west bank of a very small stream.  It can easily be crossed to the east.  To the west is a dirt road.  To the north and south is forest which is impassable.

fields.name: You are on the east bank of a stream.  (E/W)
fields.description: You are on the east bank of a stream.  You can cross the stream to the west.  To the east is a dirt road.  There is an impassable forest to both the north and south.

fields.name: You are on an east/west dirt road.
fields.description: You are on a dirt road.  The road leads off both east and west.  There is to the north and south impassable forest.

fields.name: You are on a dirt road.  (E/W)
fields.description: The road seems to go west.  To the east is a door going back into the castle.  To the north and south is impassable forest.

fields.name: You are on a sandy north/south path.
fields.description: You are on a sandy path.  To the north is a dirt road and to the south the path continues.  There is impassable forest to the east and west.

fields.name: You are on a sandy north/south path.  (N/S)
fields.description: It continues both north and south.  There is impassable forest to the east and west.

fields.name: You are at end of sandy path.  (N)
fields.description: You are at the end of a north/south path that is covered with sand.  To the south is a cliff which is too high to descend.  There is a broken down hearse hanging over the cliff.  Thick forest prevents you from going east or west.

fields.name: You are in forging room.  (S)
fields.description: You are in a very hot room.  It appears to be used for forging things.  The room is completely covered with soot.  There is only one exit, to the south.

fields.name: You are in underground graveyard.  (S)
fields.description: It has a dirt floor and there are many tombstones scattered on top of mounds here and there.  Because it is a totally closed room, the only exit is south.

fields.name: You are at the drop off point.  (E)
fields.description: You are in a small room.  The walls are made of solid rock as is the ceiling and the floor.  There is a crude hole in the east wall which you can get through.

fields.name: You are in short hall.  (N/E/W)
fields.description: You can see a door to the north and a hole in the wall to the west.  The southern wall is solid rock and the hall leads east.

fields.name: You are at bottom of a stairwell.  (E/W/U)
fields.description: You are in a short hall.  There is a staircase which leads up.  The north and south walls are made of solid rock.  The hall leads both east and west.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection.  (N/S/W)
fields.description: You are at the east end of a short hall.  There is a slightly open door to the north.  A small and rough passage leads south.  The hall leads west.

fields.name: You are in a damp cave.  (S/E)
fields.description: The floor is made of dirt and water drips from the ceiling or roof of the place.  It is rather musty.  There is a rough corridor to the east, and the cave continues south although it is very dark.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection.  (N/E/W)
fields.description: You are in a broken corridor.  You see a cave to the west and a very small tunnel to the east.  There is a hallway to the north.

fields.name: You are in a low crawl.  (S/W)
fields.description: You are in a small tunnel crawling on your hands and knees.  There is a large room to the south and a broken tunnel to the west.

fields.name: You are in the suicide chamber.  (N)
fields.description: You are in a large room.  There are many bodies scattered about in positions that makes one fact obvious: they took their own lives.  I hope that Dracula doesn't drive you to this.  The only exit is a small tunnel to the north.

fields.name: You are in a damp cave. (N/W)
fields.description: It is very dark in the cave. You can hear water dripping. There is a very dark tunnel to the west and a tunnel to the north that seems brighter.
fields.dark_name: You are in a dark cave.
fields.dark_description: It is very dark, and you cannot see anything. You can hear water dripping. To the north you see faint light, but not enough to make out any details. The cave might continue for a long time but it is too dark to see if this is true.

fields.name: You are in a damp cave.  (S/W)
fields.description: It is very dark in the cave. You can hear water dripping. Dark passages lead south and west. The cave might continue for a long time, but it is too dark to see if this is true.
fields.dark_name: You are in a dark cave.
fields.dark_description: It is very dark, and you cannot see anything. You can hear water dripping. The cave might continue for a long time, but it is too dark to see if this is true. From feeling the walls, your best guess is that tunnels lead south and west.

fields.name: You are in a cave entrance. (S/E/W)
fields.description: You are at the entrance to a dark, damp cave. To the west is daylight. Tunnels lead to the south and east, but it's too dark to see where they go.

fields.name: You are in a damp cave.  (N/E)
fields.description: You are in a dark cave. The tunnel leads north and east from here, but it is too dark to see anything in either direction.
fields.dark_name: You are in a dark cave.
fields.dark_description: The cave is very dark, and you cannot see anything. You can hear water dripping. The cave might continue for a long time, but it is too dark to see if this is true. You think you see a glimmer of light coming from the north.

fields.name: You are in a damp cave.  (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in a cave. Water is dripping from the ceiling. Tunnels continue north, south, east, and west. All of them look very dark.
fields.dark_name: You are in a dark cave.
fields.dark_description: It is very dark, and you cannot see anything. You can hear water dripping. Feeling your way around, you find tunnels that seem to lead north, south, east, and west.

fields.name: You are in a damp cave.  (N)
fields.description: This is a dead-end in the cave. Smooth stone walls surround you on the east, west, and south. The only way out is a dark tunnel to the north.
fields.dark_name: You are in a dark cave.
fields.dark_description: It is very dark, and you cannot see anything. The tunnel is narrower here. Feeling your way around, you think the tunnel doesn't go any further south. Possibly a dead end.

fields.name: You are on a beach near a cave. (E/W)
fields.description: You are at the east end of a long beach that extends far to the west. To the east is the entrance of a dark cave. There is a cliff, too steep to climb, preventing you from going to the north. The sea to the south prevents you from going in that direction.

fields.name: You are on an east beach by a river.  (E/W)
fields.description: You are on a beach.  It extends both to the east and west.  A cliff prevents you from going north, and a sea to the south does the same.  There is a small stream cascading over the cliff to the west.

fields.name: You are on a west beach by a stream.  (E/W)
fields.description: You are on a beach.  It extends both to the east and west.  A cliff prevents you from going north, and a sea to the south does the same for that direction.  There is a stream tumbling over the cliff to the east.

fields.name: You are at the west end of the beach. (E/U)
fields.description:
You are on a beach which heads east. A sea prevents you from going south and a cliff prevents you from going north. It is also unclimbable. Atop the cliff you can see a hearse that is partly hanging over the edge. The sand here looks as if it were freshly dug up.

There are rocks to the west that are piled against the side of the cliff and extend out into the sea.  Although they are not high enough to let you climb the cliff, it looks as if you could climb over them. You can also see a bridge leading to an island about a hundred yards out from the shore. The bridge looks old and rickety, but it should support your weight. The main problem is that it hits the shore at a place behind the rocks.

fields.name: You are on a small beach.  (S/U)
fields.description: You are on a beach.  The ocean cuts the beach off so going west is impossible as is going north because of the cliff.  You see a pile of rocks that you can climb over.  To the south is a rickety old bridge.

fields.name: You are at the north end of a bridge.  (N/S)
fields.description: You are on an old wooden bridge.  There is a beach to the north, and the bridge continues to the south.  To the east and west is the ocean, thus no passage.

fields.name: You are on the middle of a bridge.  (N/S)
fields.description: You are at the middle of an old wooden bridge.  You cannot walk east or west because that would mean death in the sea.  The bridge continues north and south.

fields.name: You are at the south end of a bridge.  (N/S)
fields.description: You are at the south end of a decrepit old bridge.  To the north the bridge continues and to the south is an island.  East and west your path is blocked by the sea.

fields.name: You are on the northwest corner of an island.  (S/E)
fields.description: You are on an island.  Shark infested waters prevent you from going north and west.  A small winding path goes east and south.

fields.name: You are at the north end of an island.  (N/S/W)
fields.description: To your north is a rickety, old bridge leading to the mainland.  A small path winds to the west and a larger one to the south.  To the east is shark infested waters.

fields.name: You are on the west side of an island.  (N/S/E)
fields.description: You are on a small path on the west side of an island.  A path goes north and south.  Through the trees to the east you can see a clearing and to the west is shark infested waters.

fields.name: You are at the north end of a clearing.  (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: A large path extends to the north and a smaller one to the west.  To the east is thick but passable foliage.  To the south you can see a large rock tower.

fields.name: You are on the east beach of an island.  (S/W)
fields.description: You are on a beach on an island.  The beach continues south and you can make it through thick bush to your west.  The ocean prevents you from going north or east.

fields.name: You are on the west end of an island.  (N/S/E)
fields.description: You are on a north/south path on an island.  Through thick grass to the east is a clearing.  In the middle of it is a large stone tower.  To the west is the ocean.

fields.name: You are at the south end of a clearing.  (N/S/E/W/U)
fields.description: You are at the south end of a clearing on an island.  You can go east or west through thick grass or south where a small path winds.  The clearing extends north.  A large stone tower stands next to you with a ladder going up it.

fields.name: You are on the east beach of an island.  (N/W)
fields.description: To the east and south is shark filled waters.  To the west is thick bush with a clearing just beyond.  The beach stretches north.

fields.name: You are at the southwest corner of an island.  (N/E)
fields.description: You are on a path that curves north and east.  To the west and south is the sea.  The brush is thick and seems to move as if alive.

fields.name: You are at the south end of an island.  (N/W)
fields.description: You are on a path that turns west and north.  To the north is a clearing.  The ocean prevents you from going south and east.

fields.name: You are at the top of a tower.  (N/D)
fields.description: You are at the top of an old stone tower on an island.  A wooden ladder goes down to the clearing and a rope one goes to the north and down inside the tower.

fields.name: You are inside the tower.  (E/W)
fields.description: You are in a dark, damp room inside the tower.  A room is to the east.

fields.name: You are in a secret room.  (N)
fields.description: You are in a small, secret, stone room.  There is very little light here and it is rather chilly.

fields.name: You are in a large secret chamber.  (W)
fields.description: The walls are covered with blood spatterings and a pile of bones lies in one corner.  There is a bed, a table with chairs, etc.  In one wall is a fireplace that keeps the chamber comfortable; something seems unusual about it...

fields.name: You are in a treasure chamber.  (W)
fields.description: You are in a large depository of gold, jewels, and other valuables!

fields.name: GoldenWrath unused
fields.description: As Dracula's sword drops from his hand, its flame dies.  You see a now-normal sword with the name "GoldenWrath" scratched into the blade.

fields.name: stake
fields.description: You see a long wooden stick with the tip sharpened.

fields.name: spiked club
fields.description: You see a large club with sharp spikes sticking out of it.

fields.name: axe
fields.description: You see a big, shiny hand axe.

fields.name: spear
fields.description: You see a long, hardwood spear with a very sharp steel point.

fields.name: silver axe
fields.description: You see an average looking axe except the handle is made of silver.

fields.name: bow
fields.description: You see a very thin and slightly glowing long bow.

fields.name: GoldenWrath
fields.description: You see a beautiful sword made of gold with a Mithril handle and the name "GoldenWrath" scratched into the blade. A cold greenish light emits from it.

fields.name: gold bell
fields.description: You see a large bell made of gold.

fields.name: iron cross
fields.description: You see a small, polished, iron cross.

fields.name: flintlock pistol
fields.description: You see a handgun with one silver bullet in it.

fields.name: empty flintlock pistol
fields.description: You see a handgun that is now empty. It was recently fired.

fields.name: glowing sword
fields.description: You see a sword that emits a dull blue glow.

fields.name: flashlight
fields.description: You see small metal cylinder that has a small button on the side.  When the button is pushed, a light emits from one end of the cylinder.

fields.name: marble idol
fields.description: You see a half human sized marble statue of a sand monster.

fields.name: Dracula's coffin
fields.description: You see a large richly decorated coffin inscribed with "Property of Dracula".

fields.name: golden shrine
fields.description: You see a highly polished shrine made of gold.

fields.name: small axe
fields.description: You see a small chopping axe.

fields.name: spices
fields.description: You see small jars filled with rare spices.

fields.name: wood statues
fields.description: You see some small statues carved out of bubinga wood.

fields.name: books
fields.description: You see some old leather-bound books with gold leaf on the binding.  They seem to be written in blood and are entitled "Spells of the Ages".

fields.name: velvet drapes
fields.description: You see some plush, puce, velvet drapes.  They are very clean and new.

fields.name: key
fields.description: You see a small, Mithril key.

fields.name: seat covers
fields.description: You see some leather seat covers studded with diamonds and other valuable jewels.

fields.name: gold pieces
fields.description: You see a bag with 300 gold pieces in it.

fields.name: emerald
fields.description: When you killed the gray slime, it dropped an emerald that it was carrying.  The emerald is carved into the shape of a blob or more accurately, a gray slime.  Inscribed on the bottom is the word "MOTHER".

fields.name: gold chunks
fields.description: You see some large chunks of gold (xorns eat gold for food).  They appear to be the remains of magical weapons and the like and are very lightweight for their size.

fields.name: scarab
fields.description: You see a small ruby scarab.

fields.name: pile of sand
fields.description: You see the sand monster, now a pile of loose sand.

fields.name: Dracula's body
fields.description: You see the still body of Dracula here. You sense a faint stirring and you think he might not quite be dead.

fields.name: dead mummy
fields.description: You see the mummy, now dead.

fields.name: dead werewolf
fields.description: You see the werewolf's limp body.

fields.name: dead bat1
fields.description: You see the first bat, bloodied and dead

fields.name: pile of bones
fields.description: You see the skeleton, now a pile of bones and unanimated.

fields.name: Blackula's body
fields.description: You see the dead African Prince.  His fangs are gone and he is back to normal except he is dead.

fields.name: Mrs. Dracula's body
fields.description: You see Dracula's wife slumped on the floor.

fields.name: dead witch
fields.description: You see the body of the old hag.  Her magick didn't help her very much!

fields.name: dead blacksmith
fields.description: You see the dead body of the blacksmith.

fields.name: dead zombie
fields.description: You see the zombie, no longer undead.  Now he's just plain dead!

fields.name: pile of rock
fields.description: With the killing blow, the xorn crumbled into a pile of rock.

fields.name: dead land shark
fields.description: You see the land shark dehydrating out of the water.

fields.name: dead tarantula
fields.description: You see a dead, furry tarantula.

fields.name: blob of gray jelly
fields.description: You see a lifeless blob of gray jelly.

fields.name: dead creeping vine
fields.description: You see the creeping vine in many pieces on the ground.  Its tendrils are no longer a threat.

fields.name: shattered sword
fields.description: You see a shattered sword.  It is no longer animated.  It seems to be made of silver, possibly Mithril.

fields.name: dead wolf1
fields.description: You see the dead body of the first wolf.

fields.name: dead wolf2
fields.description: You see the dead body of the second wolf.

fields.name: dead wolf3
fields.description: You see the dead body of the third wolf.

fields.name: dead wolf4
fields.description: You see the dead body of the forth wolf.

fields.name: dead wolf5
fields.description: You see the dead body of the fifth wolf.

fields.name: dead wolf6
fields.description: You see the dead body of the sixth wolf.

fields.name: dead bat2
fields.description: You see the second bat, dead.

fields.name: Sheryl's body
fields.description: You see a little girl's dead body.

fields.name: Belg of Melsan's body
fields.description: You see a barbarian's dead body.

fields.name: diamond necklace
fields.description: You see a necklace covered with diamonds.

fields.name: statuette
fields.description: You see a small gold statuette with emerald eyes.

fields.name: silks
fields.description: You see a pile of very fine silks.

fields.name: black lotus
fields.description: You see a jar full of the legendary black lotus.

fields.name: tapestries
fields.description: You see some tapestries hanging on the wall.

fields.name: broadsword
fields.description: You see a large broadsword.

fields.name: brass door
fields.description: To the north is a locked door made of polished brass.

fields.name: a secret door to the south
fields.description: Amongst the unusual carvings you find a switch that activates a secret door!

fields.name: a secret door to the east
fields.description: You find a cleverly designed secret door!

fields.name: a secret door to the east
fields.description: You discover a lever that causes a secret door to open!

fields.name: shovel
fields.description: You see a small, compact shovel lying here.

fields.name: rubies
fields.description: You see bowl full of small rubies.

fields.name: magic barrier
fields.description: An invisible magic barrier blocks the passage west. Though you can't see it, it's hard as stone and appears impenetrable.

fields.name: pile of dust
fields.description: A pile of dust is on the floor here, the remains of Dracula!

fields.text: You discover yourself walking into a cave wall.
You climbed up and over the rocks.
As Dracula's sword drops from his hand, its flame dies.
You are in a secret chamber.  It is now completely bare.  The table, chairs, rugs, etc. are all gone.  Only the fireplace remains.
Only one word is legible:  "MIYRM"

You cruel, heartless fiend!  What did she ever do to you?  Now let's see what I can do to you.  Hmm, I've got it.  You find yourself chained to a wall in a small chamber.  You are completely naked and unarmed.  Thousands of large rats engulf you and enjoy a long needed meal.  You are dead!  Ha, ha!
You cannot flee with the creeping vine holding on to you!
You find that some magic prevents you from leaving the room.
You can't give anything to a piece of metal!  I've a good mind to lower your intelligence (if that were an Eamon attribute).
Inside the hearse you see what appear to be some very fancy seat covers.
As you put the key in the keyhole, you feel yourself being thrust through the door to the other side.
A glitter on the floor catches your eye...
The creeping vine has wrapped tendrils around all in your party.
Dracula picks up his sword and mumbles some words.  The sword shoots back into flame!
You wake up and find yourself in a room that is now very empty.  Belg is gone as is everything else that was around.  You suddenly realize that it was all an illusion!
As you hit the gray slime, it sprays acid that dissolves holes in your weapon!
The magical wall to the west shatters into a million shards!
You hear a loud shatter come from the main floor of the castle!
The magic arrow whizzes by Belg and, to your amazement, does no damage!
You suddenly realize that you are very drunk and can't tell which direction is which.
You feel yourself moving through the dungeon and being dropped in shark infested water.  Sharks like humans!  You are quite dead.
The ground shakes and your teeth almost rattle out, but nothing of importance happens.
Your body feels much better all of a sudden as you discover all your wounds have healed!
The weapon in your hand shakes and starts to glow!
The weapon in your hand shakes and turns a dull grey color!
You walk into what appears to be a magical and impenetrable glass wall.
You realize that your drunken stupor has dissipated and you're back to normal!
The xorn flees into a wall and vanishes!
A xorn steps out of a wall and into the room with you!
Dracula rises from the ground, blood dripping from his face, and laughs!
Just when you thought Dracula was dead, he strides into the room, blood dripping from his face. He laughs and resumes his attack!
You drive the stake into Dracula's heart! His body convulses, and disintegrates into a pile of dust!
Dracula is too strong to use the stake! Maybe if you knocked him down first?

fields.name: Sand Monster
fields.description: You see a large creature made of sand standing before you.

fields.name: Dracula
fields.description: You see standing before you the Prince of Darkness himself, Dracula.  He is dressed in his traditional garb of black suit with cape and white teeth (very sharp teeth I might add).

fields.name: Mummy
fields.description: You see a creature wrapped in smelly old, rotting bandages.  He grabs a stick that was laying near him and is now wielding it as a club.

fields.name: Werewolf
fields.description: You see a wolf that looks surprisingly like a man (or vice versa).  He has a spiked club in his hand.

fields.name: Bat1
fields.description: You see a large vampire bat.

fields.name: Skeleton
fields.description: You see a Weight Watchers graduate.  He is holding a mean looking axe in his hand.

fields.name: Blacula
fields.description: You see an African Prince that was changed into a vampire by Dracula.  He still has his old weapon from Africa, a spear.

fields.name: Dracula's Wife
fields.description: You see an extremely attractive female.  You do notice one exasperating feature about her, however.  She has long, sharp fangs.  She wields a standard axe.

fields.name: Witch
fields.description: You see an old hag complete with warts on her nose and knuckles.  Her skin has a faint greenish color and the rest of her fits the standard pattern for a witch.  She carries a bow as a weapon.

fields.name: Blacksmith
fields.description: You see a large, muscular, sweaty man with a tattoo on his upper left arm that says, "XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX" [censored].  He has two meaty fists that he uses well as weapons.

fields.name: Zombie
fields.description: You see (and smell) a dirty, undead man who lurches forward at you menacingly.

fields.name: Xorn
fields.description: You see a lump of rock that seems to be moving-- no, it is moving!  Yes folks, its a real monster!  The xorn lashes out at you with its stony arms.

fields.name: Land Shark
fields.description: You see a shark freshly emerged from the water that ambles in your direction.  It has very sharp teeth.

fields.name: Tarantula
fields.description: You see a very large and hairy, black spider, its mandibles a choppin'.

fields.name: Gray Slime
fields.description: You notice a blob of milky, grayish jelly creeping along the floor.  It leaves a slime trail behind it as it moves.

fields.name: Creeping Vine
fields.description: You see a vine that comes in your direction, leaves a-blazing.  It attacks you with tendrils that wrap around you and suck out blood and other body fluids while holding you fast.

fields.name: Animated Sword
fields.description: You see a double bladed broadsword in the air moving as if being swung by an unseen warrior.

fields.name: Wolf1
fields.description: You see a snarling wolf.

fields.name: Wolf2
fields.description: You see a second snarling wolf.

fields.name: Wolf3
fields.description: You see a third snarling wolf.

fields.name: Wolf4
fields.description: You see a fourth snarling wolf.

fields.name: Wolf5
fields.description: You see a fifth snarling wolf.

fields.name: Wolf6
fields.description: You see a sixth snarling -and the largest and strongest looking- wolf.

fields.name: Bat2
fields.description: You see a second large vampire bat.

fields.name: Sheryl
fields.description: You see a little girl with wistful look on her face.  She says her name is "Sheryl".

fields.name: Belg of Melsan
fields.description: You see a large, barbarian warrior in front of you.  He mumbles some words and you find that any attempt to escape from the room is fruitless.  He wields a large glowing broadaxe.  He yells at you, "No one has ever beaten Belg of Melsan!"

fields.question: How do I get out of the castle?
Help! The gray slime keeps melting my weapons!

fields.answer: The barrier can be broken, but not by conventional means. Try searching for magic words.
There is a magic word in one of the Witch's spell books which can help. Try the north end of the second floor.
Some items normally associated with vampire hunters can help. You'll find them near your drop off point.
If you show the cross to any vampire, they will run away, giving you time to heal.
Dracula will rise again unless you kill him for good.
Driving a stake into his heart is the only way to truly kill Dracula. You can only use the stake once you have defeated him in normal combat. Otherwise he's too powerful.
Say "FLAME ON" to turn it on, and "FLAME OFF" to turn it off.
Try using a missile weapon, or the BLAST spell.
